1 using System;
2 using System.Collections.Generic;
3 using UnityEditor;
4 using UnityEngine;
5 
6 namespace FullInspector.Samples.Other.Limits {
7  [CustomAttributePropertyEditor(typeof(LimitsAttribute), ReplaceOthers = false)]
8  public class LimitsAttributeEditor<TElement> : AttributePropertyEditor<TElement, LimitsAttribute> {
9  private static T Cast<T>(object o) {
10  return (T)Convert.ChangeType(o, typeof(T));
11  }
12 
13  protected override TElement Edit(Rect region, GUIContent label, TElement element, LimitsAttribute attribute) {
14  return Cast<TElement>(GUI.HorizontalSlider(region, Cast<float>(element), attribute.Min, attribute.Max));
15  }
16 
17  protected override float GetElementHeight(GUIContent label, TElement element, LimitsAttribute attribute) {
18  return EditorStyles.label.CalcHeight(label, 100);
19  }
20 
21  public override bool CanEdit(Type type) {
22  return type == typeof(int) || type == typeof(double) || type == typeof(float);
23  }
24  }
25 }
